page.title: 03FARMING 2
page.content: One of the farms in our area is called {Parkers Farm}which has got a big area of {crops .}Their crops are mostly { {winter wheat }and {winter barley }but they do have a bit of {oil seed rape}. The main crop in our area is {oil seed {rape }which is grown at a lot of far- ms . At {Rownhams Farm}they sell their goods like {potatoes, cabbages, eggs, {straw }and other things . To cut the crops like {winter wheat }and {winter {barley }our farms use {combine harves- {ter }for the big fields and {combine { harvester}that fit onto {tractors } for many jobs on the farm. The farmer hooks other machines on the tractor. Theese machines are called implements . There is dairy machinery as well on some farms.For the whole dairy to be made it costs Â£40,000.
